name: Verify that clicking on the Create a Rule option opens the rule addition form

steps.name: Given I open a browser and open RBAC Login page
When I click on sign in RBAC link
Then I enter the username and password to RBAC as tlsapp
Given Click on Create a rule
When Check whether the form is opened or not

fullName: UI test cases: Verify that clicking on the Create a Rule option opens the rule addition form
